channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins XebiaLabs XL Deploy Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins XebiaLabs XL Deploy Plugin

item.title: CVE-2019-10305|2024-08-04T22:17:20.111Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20xebialabs%20xl%20deploy%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins XebiaLabs XL Deploy Plugin in the Credential#doValidateUserNamePassword form validation method allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to initiate a connection to an attacker-specified server.

item.title: CVE-2019-10304|2024-08-04T22:17:19.986Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20xebialabs%20xl%20deploy%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins XebiaLabs XL Deploy Plugin in the Credential#doValidateUserNamePassword form validation method allows attackers to initiate a connection to an attacker-specified server.
